Html:
Hey, guys

I am create an outlook add-in by NetOffice.
But I don't know how to create a custom form region?

I read the link below
Chapter 13: Creating Form Regions

But in the article, MS has a interface "Outlook.FormRegionStartup"
In NetOffice, there is also a "FormRegionStartup", BUT IT IS A CLASS

And until now, I already have a class inherit from COMAddin, and it is the entry of office add-in.
So I completely do not know how to use FormRegionStartup class in NetOffice.
I even can not find it in NetOffice example.

Can anyone give me an example or some codes?
Please, help me finish this problem.
Thank you very much.
I have started similar discussion last year (https://netoffice.codeplex.com/discussions/428189) and got an answer that NetOffice doesn't have desired interface.
